passed a resolution to continue the
policy of supporting tuition fees for school supplies in the
2023-2024 school year, according to which the new point is that
junior high school students are
exempted from 100 minutes of tuition
fees. The city will spend
1,847  billion VND to support tuition fees to share
the burden with parents when the economy is
difficult. Accordingly, group one is students studying
in Thu Duc city and districts and
group two is students studying in districts
of the city depending on the grant.  Students
receive tuition support from 100,000 to
300,000 VND per month. In addition, middle
school students are free at the high school level.
Parents pay an additional 100 to
120,000 VND per month compared to the current rate.
Kindergarten and kindergarten parents in
area 1 pay an additional 160 to 200,000 VND a
month. In area 2, the city does not
support the payment, the rate is 100 to 120,000 VND a
month for primary school students are
exempted from tuition according to the education law.

Each painting

overcome the number of snake patients in Khanh Hoa.  The number of
bites requiring hospitalization is increasing.
Khanh Hoa Provincial General Hospital said that
on average, each day, on average,
three to five patients have been
bitten by snakes with varying degrees of severity,
notably some cases of snakebite.
seriously injured and had to be hospitalized for many days due to a
poisonous snake
bite after three days of continuous treatment with
serum injections and medication. But
Mr. Le Quy Vien's hand in Ninh Van commune,
Ninh Hoa town is still swollen and painful.
Three days ago, he went to the garden
to pull weeds and was bitten on the hand by a red-tailed Loc snake and was
admitted to the hospital with
muscle pain, drooping eyelids, difficulty swallowing, slurred speech, numbness in the arms and legs,
and a blood disorder according to
doctors in Vietnam.  Snake bites
especially occur most frequently in November, with rain and
floods lasting for many days, disrupting the
snake's habitat, so they find
other places to shelter and find food.
Sometimes, patients come to the hospital.  is
mild, but there are cases where the
patient is admitted to the hospital quite late. There are
cases of necrosis of the white half, often with
poisonous snakes. Doctors advise people that if they are
unfortunately bitten by a poisonous snake, they should not
use other measures.  suck out snake venom
or use traditional folk medicine to
treat by taking the
patient to a medical facility as soon as
possible. In the next part of the

yesterday,
Ho Chi Minh City district police arrested Bui Chai.  Cuong from
Dak Lak province to investigate the act of robbery,
ordered this person to work with the investigation agency,
Cuong confessed that because he did not have a
stable job and lacked money to spend,
the subject came up with the idea of ​​robbing property
in the country.  On December 5, Cuong rode his motorbike
around the streets to look for Mui and
discovered that Ms. Tran Thi Kim Chi was riding a
motorbike carrying a boy who was stopping to buy groceries
and her phone was in the
glove box at the handlebars.  Cuong immediately ordered a car to approach and
snatch Chi's cell phone,
then drove away to receive the
victim's report. Cu Chi district police tracked him down,
caught Cuong, recovered her
property and returned it to her.
In Tay Ninh province, yesterday, representatives of the
provincial police came to visit and encourage
the health of two siblings, Nguyen Lam Vu
and Nguyen Thanh Lam, who both live in Gia
Loc ward, Trang Ban town, and were
injured while hunting for the suspect.
Previously robbed at about 5:00 a.m. on
December 4, a 60-year-old woman was walking and
exercising on the street in
Gia Tan neighborhood, Gia Loc ward, when a
young man on a motorbike approached and snatched the
gold transmission chain.  Hearing the altar woman's voice calling for
robbery, Mr. Vu immediately took his motorbike and
took Mr. Lam with him to chase the suspect. During the
chase, Mr. Vu's car slipped, causing the two
brothers to fall and the robber also
panicked, leaving behind three plastic bags inside.  There were
three dogs. Mr. Vu and Mr. Lam died.
People took them to the hospital. The
initial diagnosis was that Mr. Vu had a
brain hemorrhage, a broken right arm, and was in a
coma. Mr. Lam had a broken left shoulder.
Police representative.  Tay Ninh province supported the
two brothers' family with an amount of 30 million VND. The
People's Committee of Trang Bang town donated
15 million VND. Trang Bang town police
donated 15 million VND to support
treatment costs. The functional forces are also
Actively investigate to arrest the

Together with some people, they opened many

died about 20 years ago.  Now the couple is traveling

Collided with a tractor-trailer traveling in the same direction, the

The woman sitting behind fell under the tractor-trailer and was run over by this
vehicle. The
victim was taken to the hospital for emergency treatment
but died.  Afterwards, the young man
was slightly injured. The identity of the woman who
died is Nguyen Dang Thuy Trang, 36 years old,
living in Ta Phu district.
Yesterday on Noi Bai Expressway,

Vietnamese employment market in this country grew
better than expected in November and that the unemployment rate
decreased specifically in November, the
US economy created an additional 100 million.  99,000 jobs
higher than October's 150,000.
Unemployment rate also fell to 3.7 minutes
from 3.9 minutes a month earlier. The
largest job gains in November were
in the health care sectors.  health and
government manufacturing activity also grew
mainly thanks to the return of
auto workers after
strikes. Another data
showed that average hourly earnings in
November increased  increased by 0.4 pH compared to October.
However, compared to the same period last year,
this increase is 4 minutes, down from
4.1 pH in October. Growth in the
labor market has helped boost
spending  consumer demand and
economic growth, but
Federal Reserve officials believe that easing
demand and slower wage growth will
do a better job of curbing inflation than most
economists do.  It is forecasted that the Fed will
keep interest rates unchanged after the next policy meeting
scheduled for

This is the tradition of this place in which the
